title: nimiSamaina shrI
sahitya:
nimiSamaina shrI rAma enarAdA nityamugAdI mAnava janmamu


anupallavi

  amita mahima galavADani rAmuni A mahAdEvuDE sannutincukaNDaka


caraNam    harihara mantramunaku jIva varNAtmakuDu suraripu rAvaNuni nigrahincinavADu 
parama bhaktulella pAlincuvADu parama puruSaTadaTE vAsudEvuDani telisi
